Name: Robowork
About the game: Robowork is a survival adventure that started when the spacecraft sent by the 'Space-T' company to investigate other inhabitable planets after the depletion of resources on Earth and the increasing pollution fell on an unknown planet for an unknown reason. Follow the developments and Join Us Explore the Unique Planet The planet you fell on has an interesting vegetation. Although the vegetation of this planet resembles Earth at first, you will see its differences from Earth as you progress. This unique environment is waiting for you to discover it. Survive You fell on an unknown planet, you don't know why you fell and how long you have been here. Your energy is at a critical level. You must immediately start planning to fill your energy and return to Earth. Modify yourself to survive. In addition, to produce advanced products, unknown minerals, liquids, etc. investigate.
